title: Nova Watch Face by Hyperflow
summary: A bold digital watch face with subtle second hand animation.
description: NOVAA bold digital watch face with subtle second hand animation.Nova watch face can also be found in the Watch Faces by Hyperflow collection. This collection contains 4 additional watch faces:PULSEA sleek watch face featuring time as text, as well as the current date.SPHEREAn abstract take on time. Designed to be both unique and stylish.CHRONOA minimal analog watch face, featuring the current date.ULTRAA minimal analog watch face with fun customization options. Complications include watch battery %, current date and second digital time. Designed for both round and square Android Wear watches.The entire Hyperflow Watch Face collection can be found here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hyperflow.connectedwatchfaces&hl=en
descriptionHTML:
NOVA
A bold digital watch face with subtle second hand animation.

Nova watch face can also be found in the Watch Faces by Hyperflow collection. This collection contains 4 additional watch faces:

PULSE
A sleek watch face featuring time as text, as well as the current date.

SPHERE
An abstract take on time. Designed to be both unique and stylish.

CHRONO
A minimal analog watch face, featuring the current date.

ULTRA
A minimal analog watch face with fun customization options. Complications include watch battery %, current date and second digital time. Designed for both round and square Android Wear watches.

The entire Hyperflow Watch Face collection can be found here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hyperflow.connectedwatchfaces&hl=en
comments: Great looking face, if it let you disable the animation when the second changed and supported bigger screens like that of the Zenwatch 3 it would be perfect.
I love it, but I wish the second hand went all the way to the edges on my LG watch style, and I want more color options.
Nicely designed, but time is small and card preview cover up the face.
Cant open or find app. Wont show on watch. Moto 360 gen 2
Not installing on my Fossil Q marshal... Boooo!
